Dewen Zeng

I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Science and Engineering Department of University of Notre Dame. My advisor is Dr. Yiyu Shi. Here is our lab website SCL. Currently, my research focuses on Deep Learning for Medical Image Applications, and Self-supervised Learning. Before coming to University of Notre Dame, I received my master’s and bachelor’s degrees at Huazhong University of Science & Technology.

GitHub  /  Google Scholar  /  CV  /  LinkedIn

Experience

Student Researcher, Google, May 2022 - Mar. 2023. (hosted by Tao Wang, Nan Du)

Intern, Allen Institute for Cell Science, May 2021 - Aug. 2021. (hosted by Jianxu Chen)
